title: Interior
provenance: Eugene V. Thaw Collection; Galerie Jacques Fischer, Paris
description: This view shows a large salon dominated by a center table covered with a green cloth. A woman, possibly doing handwork, is seated on a cane chair at the table.  On the right, two women are at the piano, while on the left, a man relaxes on a sofa. The parquet floor in a large diamond pattern and Empire armchairs complete the room.
name: Drawing
